text: thumb|right|180px|Stamp in January 2009 Terence Henry Stamp (born 22 July 1938) is a British movie, voice, television, and stage actor who has appeared in over 100 movies such as; The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert, Superman II, Get Smart,The Haunted Mansion, Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace, Valkyrie, Yes Man, and Wanted. Stamp has been awarded a Golden Globe Award, Silver Bear Award, and a Satellite Award. He has acted in over 100 films. Stamp was born in Stepney, London.In the London Borough of Tower Hamlets In the 1960s he and supermodel girlfriend Jean Shrimpton were one of the most photographed couples of the day. Another of his famous girlfriends was Julie Christie. Later, Stamp became a follower of Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh, and lived for a while at the latter's ashram (~estate) in Poona. At 64, Stamp married 29 year old Elizabeth O'Rourke in 2002. The couple divorced in 2008. == References == ==Other websites== *Terence Stamp website * * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:People from the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: Terence Stamp
